languages.text: "Надзиратели заблокированы в охранных комплексах, но среди каторжан немало тех, кто верен Вашей Светлости. Они помнят, сколь милосердно вы поступали с ними в прошлом, и могут сменить сторону".

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."
languages.original_text: "Надзиратели заблокированы в охранных комплексах, но среди каторжан немало тех, кто верен Вашей Светлости. Они помнят, сколь милосердно вы поступали с ними в прошлом, и могут сменить сторону".

traits.locale_text: "The wardens are trapped up inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember how merciful you have been to them in the past, and may switch sides."

"The wardens are trapped up inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember how merciful you have been to them in the past, and may switch sides."

"The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

"The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

languages.text: “看守都被困在了安全设施里，但囚犯之中还有很多人忠于您。他们还记得您过去的仁慈之举，有可能会加入您的行列。”
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

traits.locale_text: “看守都被困在了安全设施里，但囚犯之中还有很多人忠于您。他们还记得您过去的仁慈之举，有可能会加入您的行列。”

languages.text: «Los guardias están atrapados dentro de las instalaciones de seguridad, pero hay mucha gente que os es leal. Aún recuerdan su misericordia en el pasado y pueden cambiar de bando».
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

traits.locale_text: «Los guardias están atrapados dentro de las instalaciones de seguridad, pero hay mucha gente que os es leal. Aún recuerdan su misericordia en el pasado y pueden cambiar de bando».

languages.text: 「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていますが、陛下に忠誠を誓っている者が大勢います。彼らはいまだに、過去のあなたの慈悲ある行いを覚えているので、寝返る可能性はあります」
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

traits.locale_text: 「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていますが、陛下に忠誠を誓っている者が大勢います。彼らはいまだに、過去のあなたの慈悲ある行いを覚えているので、寝返る可能性はあります」

languages.text: « Les gardiens sont piégés à l'intérieur des installations de sécurité, mais la majeure partie des détenus vous reste fidèle, Votre Seigneurie. Ils n'ont pas oublié votre magnanimité de la dernière fois et pourraient bien changer de camp. »
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

traits.locale_text: « Les gardiens sont piégés à l'intérieur des installations de sécurité, mais la majeure partie des détenus vous reste fidèle, Votre Seigneurie. Ils n'ont pas oublié votre magnanimité de la dernière fois et pourraient bien changer de camp. »

languages.text: "Die Wärter sind in den Sicherheitsanlagen eingesperrt, doch es gibt viele Leute, die Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} treu ergeben sind. Sie erinnern sich daran, wie gnädig Ihr wart, und könnten die Seiten wechseln."
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wärter sind in den Sicherheitsanlagen eingesperrt, doch es gibt viele Leute, die Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} treu ergeben sind. Sie erinnern sich daran, wie gnädig Ihr wart, und könnten die Seiten wechseln."
